title: Group Learning Design Strategies to Strengthen Organizational Learning Culture (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational learning processes
context.additional_context: Organizational learning culture diagnosis and group learning activation strategies for managers/leaders

learning_goals: A survey-based analysis can diagnose the level of learning culture within an organization
Develop three or more practical strategies to facilitate group learning
Explain the interaction mechanism between the role of a learning facilitator and organizational culture
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
